Summary: I filmed several ufo's over my house
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Narrows
There were no other sightings in Narrows on or around July 20th 2007
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsi filmed several ufo's over my house today. they flew in every direction , trailed a helicopter, appeared and disappeared, at one time i had two or 3 at a time in the frame. some were close and some had to be zoomed in on. this should help the investigation currently being conducted by mufon. i uploaded all 5 to you tube. link below: http:\\www.youtube.com\watch?v=kwhtdknsyqm be sure to view full screen. i used a kodak easyshare c653 camera set to video. all activity was filmed from my front porch. chemical smell in the air and breezy. no noise other than my dogs at feeding time (not unusual) and the air conditioner running.
